NET CARBON EMISSIONS
We report our net greenhouse gas 
emissions (GHG) in metric tons of CO2e, which illustrates the impact of our procurement and production of renewable energy. Our emissions are broken down into Scope 1, 2 & 3.
This year , for the first time, emissions 
from the travel by our third party 
service and installation vehicles have been included as part of our Scope 3 emissions. As a result, our reported GHG emissions increased this year.
